__e: You're the only one around who has wielded Merlin's magic and lived to tell about it.
All your magic, Merlin, and you can't save my life.
I don't care what Merlin said.
Merlin was right - he could have killed me but instead he thought it was more important to give me this, and he gave his life in doing so.
Belle, what Merlin said about a man that can control dark for good...
